settingsTolerance.description: Set the time for which the asynchronous script will wait for the page settings to load

libraryTolerance.description: If the page settings load within the settingsTolerance time interval, the code requests the VWO library (va.js or vanj.js) from our CDN and waits for the file to load at the interval indicated by the variable libraryTolerance else the VWO code on the page will show the control version (original version) instead

useExistingJquery.description: If your account ID is higher than or equal to 460038, we do not serve you with the jQuery version 1.4.2. Instead, we serve you with a customized version that is five times smaller. We did this to ensure that your website remains performant enough while using VWO. To convert the VWO jQuery code snippet into a non-jQuery code snippet, set useExistingJquery to true in your config.

isSPA.description: is your website a Single Page Application?
